name: Technical Machine: Crisis Punch
effect: The Pokémon this card is attached to can use the attack on this card. (You still need the necessary Energy to use this attack.) If this card is attached to 1 of your Pokémon, discard it at the end of your turn.
author: Studio Bora Inc.

attacks.name: Crisis Punch
attacks.effect: You can use this attack only when your opponent has exactly 1 Prize card remaining.
